title: how can i swap my summoner name with my username ?
body: I wanna swap my summoners name with my username, or how can i email Riot support . PLS Help me.

replies.body: A username is only known to you, and not visible to anyone so it's not something that can be changed.  If you are trying to change your summoner name but can't, it's possible that it's already taken by another player.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
